text: The Colombian Open 2015 is the men's edition of the 2015 Colombian Open, which is a tournament of the PSA World Tour event International (Prize money : 50 000 $). The event took place in Bogota in Colombia from 5 to 8 August. Alfredo Ávila won his first Colombian Open trophy, beating Saurav Ghosal in the final. ==Prize money and ranking points== For 2015, the prize purse was $50,000.
